content:
hey all, I feel like I've been more grumpy / less open to ideas / less patient lately, but no one's been willing to tell me to my face because I have a lot of "soft power" in the rust org. I'd appreciate if you left me anonymous feedback here on whether that's accurate (and anything else you'd like to talk about): https://www.admonymous.co/jyn514

FYI I've already shared this in a couple other groups with the goal of making it harder for me to identify any one person, including some that aren't online; so telling me you're from rust / zulip will make it easier for me to tell who you are and I'd suggest not doing that unless it's important to the message.

I know some of you learned english as a second language so maybe run it through google translate and back idk; this seems like a hard problem to avoid in general without showing it to a native english speaker.

also fun anecdote: google translate turns "discord chat" into "chats of disagreement" :laughing:
image.png

I'm new here so I don't have any feedback to contribute directly, but Google translate is extremely good in some languages. I know some native French speakers that would write reports in English and translate to French, because that was better than what they could write.

@Joshua Nelson it's great to improve oneself and being aware of it, but, please, be gentle to yourself. I have seen you help lots and lots of people and devoting a lot of time to the project, so maybe you just need some time for yourself and relax.
Anyhow, thankyou for what you have been doing for the Rust project!

small update on this: I've been getting respectful, and for the most part very constructive, feedback throughout the week - thank you all! :heart: the common thread is "you said you're on vacation but you're still reviewing PRs" so I'm going to try and stop doing that :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
